identified-content.object.title: You Can't Take A Balloon Into the Metropolitan Museum (Book)

abstract.p: Ralph J Preiss letter on Walter Goodman Nov 15 review of his daughter's book You Can't Take a Balloon Into the Metropolitan Museum by Jacqueline Preiss Weitzman and illustrated by Robin Preiss Glasser (S)

block.p: The answer to the question ''Where's Grandpa?,'' posed by Walter Goodman in his review of my two daughters' picture book, ''You Can't Take a Balloon Into the Metropolitan Museum'' (Children's Books in Brief, Nov. 15), is that Grandpa can be seen on the back cover sitting in front of the Met enjoying his favorite pastime, the New York Times crossword puzzle, because his arthritic knee does not allow him to keep up with the young museumgoer.
